Open Source for Public Good

Building Digital Public Infrastructure for the World

In todayâ€™s complex state of geopolitics marked by de-globalization and weaponized economics, software security is a key aspect of national security and national independence, especially in the digital public infrastructure that powers nations. Free and open source software that can be freely developed, deployed and used without restrictions from world powers is the path to software freedom.

The Lanka Software Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to helping Sri Lankan software engineers create such software for the world.

Learn more about our projects and about us.

Lanka Software Foundation

  • Lanka Software Foundation
  • contact@opensource.lk
  • LSFLK

Lanka Software Foundation is a non-profit organization that promotes the development of Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) in Sri Lanka by giving Sri Lankan developers the environement, facilities and support they need to create and maintain FOSS projects.
